meanings.definition: A yellow or brown pigment found in plants and algae.
meanings.sent1: The xanthophylls in the leaves give them their yellow color.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study xanthophylls to understand how plants capture sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The xanthophylls in the garden seemed to be having a party, turning everything yellow!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as xanthophylls, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The artist used xanthophylls in the painting to create a vibrant and warm atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Any of various yellow pigments in plants and animals.
meanings.sent1: The xanthophylls in the bird feathers make them look so colorful.
meanings.sent2: Animals like flamingos get their pink color from xanthophylls in their diet.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the xanthophylls in the flowers were delicious treats!
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with xanthophylls, creating a stunning display.
meanings.sent5: The garden glowed with the vibrant hues of xanthophylls, attracting butterflies and bees.
